sample.title: Avalanche (compare classic ciphers)
sample.summary: This template demonstrates the avalanche effect in two different classic ciphers at the same time.
sample.description: This template shows how the Avalanche Visualization component can be used to demonstrate the avalanche effect of two different classic ciphers at the same time.
sample.title: Avalanche (Vergleich klassischer Verschlüsselungsverfahren)
sample.summary: Diese Vorlage demonstriert den Avalanche-Effekt beim Vergleich von zwei unterschiedlichen klassischen Verschlüsselungsverfahren.
sample.description: Diese Vorlage zeigt, wie man mit der Komponente 'Avalanche-Visualisierung' den Avalanche-Effekt beim Vergleich von zwei unterschiedlichen klassischen Verschlüsselungsverfahren demonstrieren kann.

replacement.value: After starting the template with “Play” first press the “Continue” button in each of the two AV components. Then you may change the text in the plaintext component. Both, the initial and the changed input are encrypted by both cipher components and the according AV components show the difference between the two ciphertexts. Remark: In this template the Spanish Strip Cipher uses the deterministic method Round Robin in order to select the homophones.
